name: Fools Errand
description:
WARNING: This game was meant to be difficult, frustrating, and absolutely despair-ridden. 

That being said, all levels are humanly possible to finish, even if they don't feel like it at times. 

This demo versions is only 10 levels at the moment with 15 more being planned out.

There is currently no music in the game, but I do recommend listening to something comfy while playing.

Also the download only supports windows at the moment and the HTML embedded version is a little weird and may take some refreshes to get working.
